page.title: 17ST.NICHOLAS C.P. 1
page.content: There has been a school in{Lutton}for almost {150}years. The old school was built in{1841.}The old school was built in {School Lane.}The school was built in a very ornate Dutch style. The new school was built in {1963-64. The new school was opened in {1963}. It was opened on {May 20th 1963}by {Cristopher Chattaway .}At the moment there are 49 children in the school. The new school has three classes and teachers, it is built in {Marriots {Gate}.We have three pets, a swimming pool and a large playing field. Half the children here have to come to school on the bus. Many of them live on farms a long way from school.The children who come to Lutton primary come from many different villages in the area.We have children who come from {Lutton, Lutton Gowts,Gedney {Marsh,Gedney Drove End,Lutton Marsh, }
